oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni's mother fears the night, whereas Tamme's does not. !nanni's father does not fear the night. In the darkness (which 'sat') lions kill one of the Ovaherero's cattle and their oxen go away. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The darkness
